00132    // Return true if this is an Adiabatic ensemble.
00133    inline bool EnergyEnsemble::isAdiabatic() const
00134    { return (type_ == ADIABATIC); }
00135  
00136    // Return true if this is an IsothermalEnsemble.
00137    inline bool EnergyEnsemble::isIsothermal() const
00138    { return (type_ == ISOTHERMAL); }
